EmailTemplate.name: 17.AMS.SmallCell.none.N.G.N.17207.Small Cells Campaign 2017.Email 1 - China vide
EmailTemplate.subject: Boost LTE network performance in busy hotpots
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Tripled data traffic. Near 100% availability. Roll out in days. Operators everywhere depend on small cells to improve coverage and capacity. Busy train stations, arenas and shopping malls are seeing huge benefits – 300 percent data traffic growth is not uncommon. Deployment takes days, with a site installed in 30 minutes. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
